mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jiaoshi(user_id, gonghao, xingming, xingbie, create_date, job_date) VALUES (#{userId},#{gonghao},#{xingming},#{xingbie},#{createDate},#{jobDate})
mapper.select: select user_id AS userId, gonghao, xingming, xingbie, create_date AS createDate, job_date AS jobDate from jiaoshi WHERE enable=1;
